pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Causal Discovery on Observational Data // Various tools for inferring causal models from observational data. The package includes an implementation of the temporal Peter-Clark (TPC) algorithm. Petersen, Osler and Ekstrm (2021) doi:10.1093/aje/kwab087. It also includes general tools for evaluating differences in adjacency matrices, which can be used for evaluating performance of causal discovery procedures.
